meanings.definition: To surpass in skill or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She outrivaled her classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outrivaled his opponents in the race.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel outrivaled the others in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outrivaled any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: His dedication to practice outrivaled all others on the team.

meanings.definition: To be superior to in competition or rivalry.
meanings.sent1: The team outrivaled their opponents in the championship game.
meanings.sent2: She outrivaled her friend in the chess match.
meanings.sent3: The cat outrivaled the dog in catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: His speed outrivaled all others on the track.
meanings.sent5: Their teamwork outrivaled any other group in the contest.
